parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To signify, indicate, give a sign, make known. From sema; to indicate.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: Of what sort. From the base of pou and hoios; individualizing interrogative what sort of, or which one.
Death, physical or spiritual. From thnesko; death.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A strengthened form of melo; to intend, i.e. Be about to be, do, or suffer something.
To be dying, be about to die, wither, decay. From apo and thnesko; to die off.
